comments.body: Looks like self.connection gets used inside `azure_container_instances_operator.py` when setting up the registry hook. Is there something else I am missing here? Design is a bit confusing admittedly as this was code I picked up from an existing PR so if there is some best practice here to change the code please let me know

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +33,37 @@    def __init__(self, conn_id='azure_registry'):
        self.conn_id = conn_id
        self.connection = self.get_conn()

    def get_conn(self):
